text: Elk Point is a city in the far southeastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is the county seat of Union County, and 2,149 people lived there at the 2020 census. Elk Point became a city in 1873. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Elk Point website Category:County seats in South Dakota Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1873 establishments in Dakota Territory
title: Elk Point, South Dakota
